description: Nunalabs is an innovative initiative founded by a Colombian ecologist and her Dutch husband, focusing on the sustainable extraction and export of medicinal plants from Ecuador. Established in 2010, they prioritize fair trade and responsible sourcing, collaborating with local indigenous communities. Utilizing advanced ultrasound extraction techniques, they produce high-quality botanical extracts for the food and pharmaceutical industries. Their commitment to environmental preservation and community empowerment drives their mission to combine ancestral knowledge with modern science.
name: Nunalabs
